content.question: A student has samples of two pure compounds, <math alttext="X C l O 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>XClO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></math> and <math alttext="Z C l O 3" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><msub><mrow><mtext>ZClO</mtext></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></math>, which contain unknown alkali metals <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>X</mtext><mtext></mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Z</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>. The student measures the mass of each sample and then strongly heats the samples to drive off all the oxygen, leaving solid residues of <math alttext="X C l" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>XCl</mtext></mrow></math> and <math alttext="Z C l" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>ZCl</mtext></mrow></math>. The student measures the mass of the solid residue from each sample. Which of the following questions can be answered from the results of the experiment?

choices.label: Which has the greater molar mass, <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> or <math alttext="Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>Z</mtext></mrow></math>?

Which has the higher boiling point, <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> or <math alttext="Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>Z</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>?

Which has the higher melting point, <math alttext="X C l" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>XCl</mtext></mrow></math> or <math alttext="Z C l" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>ZCl</mtext></mrow></math>?

Which has the greater density, <math alttext="X C l" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>XCl</mtext></mrow></math> or <math alttext="Z C l" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>ZCl</mtext></mrow></math>?

content.answer: Which has the greater molar mass, <math alttext="X" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>X</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> or <math alttext="Z" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mtext>Z</mtext></mrow></math>?

skill.text: 2.A: Identify a testable scientific question based on an observation, data, or a model.
